website_summaries.verdict: Comfortable and convenient, the U-shape design allows you to reach areas that a conventional handheld massager may not. Features a kneading action with heated plates.
pros: Ergonomic U-shape design allows full control of pressure applied to intended massage area
auto switch-off function means it won't overheat, prolonging life span
Easy-to-clean PU leather material and mesh help heat penetrate into muscles
Reaches areas that one might struggle with a conventional handheld massager
cons: Some buyers find they cannot get to grips with the U-shape design

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: Just got this in today. I suffer from a bunch of migraines caused by a stressful job. First impression this dude is way sturdier and bigger than I figured it would’ve been. I used it to help ease up some of the knots and tension I carry in my shoulders and neck. Now my husband didn’t enjoy it but he doesn’t enjoy massages. Me on the other hand I love deep tissue massage. I’m very impressed. I think for forty bucks it’s well worth the shot. And if you don’t like it just regift it. I mean forty dollars is cheaper than one massage. I think this thing will save me money and help my tension headaches. Treat yo self.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Johns

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product and awesome customer service if you should need it.
customer_reviews.text: Update: I've come back to update my review after an unexpected and awesome experience with Naipo's customer service. They apparently care a great deal about their reputation, and after reading my review of my first massager (which broke after the return window had closed), Naipo reached out to me to send me a replacement. I was pretty much blown away. That said, the new unit is great and truly, these massagers are awesome-- since my original purchase, I bought two more, one for my mother and one for my sister, they love theirs as well. Anyhow, I can't say enough nice things about how Naipo took care of me, unsolicited no less, and their product is truly first rate.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J-O

customer_reviews.title: Heavenly help!
customer_reviews.text: I am completely in love with this massager!! I have owned many types over the years but this one really gets the kinks out!! The only change I would love to see is to have the controls lower down so they're easier to reach! You can't go wrong with this!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever!!
customer_reviews.text: BEST PURCHASE ALIVE!!! IF YOU HAVE CONSTANT NECK PAIN, SHOULDERS PAIN, BACK PAIN THEN IT IS FOR YOU! DON'T HESITATE! JUST GET IT! IT'S LIKE A DEEP TISSUE MASSAGE, PROBABLY BETTER THAN SOME MASSAGE I'VE GOTTEN OVER THE YEAR! I am in constant neck/shoulder pain due to work, I go get massages every other week. Spending so much money just relieve some pain. But this, I got this in the mail today and I'm telling you. WORTH EVERY PENNY!!! I am a very satisfied customer! Using it right now as we speak, and it is amazing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yes. Buy. Now.
customer_reviews.text: It’s amazing. Buy it. Now. Don’t hesitate. It’s a little strong. But incredible
customer_reviews.author: TravelingMom

customer_reviews.title: My lower back thanks you
customer_reviews.text: I've had a number of lower back issues ever since I got in a pretty bad car wreck in highschool. Every so often my lower discs get out of alignment and it causes my left side to tense up like a rock which further worsens the problem. While I still need a chiropractor to pop it back into place this thing loosens up those muscles and all but destroys all of my pain. I also have a very labor intensive job bending over and handling boxes all day so it's nice to finally have something to work out all the kinks that creates throughout a 12-14 hour day
customer_reviews.author: Brand794

customer_reviews.title: Pretty awesome massager!
customer_reviews.text: Wife and I absolutely love this massager. We were introduced to it by a close friend that said she loved it and so we gave it a try and decided to order our own. So far it does a great job massaging my back and neck. The heat is pretty awesome too. I haven't tried it anywhere else but overall I am very impressed. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Javier Arencibia

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: I always rely of product reviews when ordering, so i thought it only fair to write a review for this product. I loved this product while it worked, but was only able to use it a handful of times before the zipper busted out on it. Obviously now it’s not functional and was a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Parton

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality. Stopped working only the third time using it.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately this product stopped working after my third time of using it. The massaging part that supposed to move and turn just somehow got stucked in the motion on it’s own and wouldn’t work anymore no matter how I reset to turn the power button on again. I expected high of it, and even when it came in it seems like good quality. But only the third time I’m using it in about a month, it’s already broken. I’m looking for a refund or a replacement of it. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS ONE!!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give it ZERO stars, I would! Does NOT work!! Lights up but massagers doesn’t move and the infra red massaging balls don’t get warm or hot, they just light up. TOTALLY DISAPPOINTED & will be returning ASAP. I will try another company but I will NEVER, EVER buy another thing from NAIPO....
customer_reviews.author: BERKSHIRE NATIVE

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. I have been having serious muscle spasms, to the point that I had to get injection to be relieved. However, this product really works wonders and eases my tense shoulder, neck muscles. Just be careful not to pull it too hard around neck, otherwise you might bruise your neck a bit. Overall, very satisfied !
customer_reviews.author: Melis

customer_reviews.title: Started smoking, burnt electronics and melted plastic while in use!
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine the first five times, then on the sixth use it started smoking and sped up significantly. Yes, while on a person! Even unplugged took time outside for the toxic fumes to dissipate enough that we were able to look in detail for how to open it. Discovered the electronics were melted and cloth cover had been eaten through by fire. Amazingly, still turns on when plugged in although we do not dare use it -- Freaky fire hazard! We're beyond the return window, for others that are considering it or have it, please monitor carefully when in use!
customer_reviews.author: MarsupilamiFan

customer_reviews.title: Great!  Try it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful. I recently completed chemo and haves lot of new aches and pains. This really helps. In fact, my sister and niece both got one, also.
customer_reviews.author: Tomie K. Avant

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a hand full of times. Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: I got this product because I love massages but never have the time to constantly book one. I was excited and pleased with this for the couple of weeks it lasted. It literally has died on me and I have no idea how to troubleshoot the issue or fix it. I’ve tried charging it up and all. I used this product appropriately and honestly a hand full of times. It’s very unreliable and sad. I feel like it may have been used or broken before because it makes no sense how it died so quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super excited about this
customer_reviews.text: Super excited about this, I have large tight knots all through out my neck and upper back between my shoulders. I can’t afford to get massages on the regular and kneading away the pain isn’t exactly my husbands favorite pass time. It feels great, although the fast speed tends to be a bit nauseating and intense. Pretty sure this should solve all my problems, at least here’s hoping.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Hash

customer_reviews.title: OMG, it is just so hard to get it ...
customer_reviews.text: OMG, it is just so hard to get it work, many times, it just does not even start, I am really really disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Zi Miao

customer_reviews.title: Great massager, might be hard for people with boney bodies
customer_reviews.text: I adore this product, it does what I need it to do and heats up my lower back! It’s easy to carry and the cord does not bother me at all! However, I originally bought this for my SO but he thought the pressure was a bit much and I ended up using it way more!
customer_reviews.author: Ms.Peach

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be improved, netting hurts bad! Fake reviews.
customer_reviews.text: First off, let me say that you should ignore all the good reviews, they may be biased. After leaving a bad review, I was repeatedly offered payment from the seller to remove my negative review. Now on to my original posted review... I have to say that the massage actually felt great, however the netting that covers the nodules was literally tearing my skin open, days later I still have a rash with the feeling of a sunburn, I think that a fabric more like spandex or something to that extent would have been a better choice instead of something so abrasive. While the massage was great, the after affects have been horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy

customer_reviews.title: Take care of those sore muscles.
customer_reviews.text: My wife has a bad shoulder that really gets sore. The design of this unit allows her to get the massage balls to the right area. She is really enjoying it. It has heat but it's really more of just a warm feeling. The loops for your arms allow you to put as much pressure as you want.
customer_reviews.author: Choglidite

customer_reviews.title: which could be nice if it was a slower speed
customer_reviews.text: Only mildly warms. Shiatsu balls are very aggressive, which could be nice if it was a slower speed, but on the lowest setting it is too much for me. The mesh over the shiatsu balls are scratchy and it says not to cover it with fabric so it leaves no choice but to have that hard plasticy material grinding against your skin.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Perfect massager for my mother
customer_reviews.text: My mom has chronic neck pain and needs massages frequently. We bought an expensive massage chair but she was not very satisfied with it. We have also purchased other shoulder massagers and they were total junks. She really likes the heating option and the hard massage it provides. Maybe I will get one for myself someday.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Solid Massager, Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: This massager really got the tension out of my shoulders, with the arm handles allowing you to ease as much or as little pressure as you need to hit the spot. It also works great targeting the lower back, legs and even glutes on a bed. My massager died about 5 weeks after I got it. I contacted NAipo customer service about their warranty on the product. They were immediately responsive and after some e-mailing back and forth they were happy to send a replacement. A+ I’ve purchased the wireless model of this massager as a gift for my parents.
customer_reviews.author: KJS

customer_reviews.title: Look for a Better product!
customer_reviews.text: "Good for the TIME it WORKED" 6 MONTHS OR LESS! Originally, I loved it and bought one for my brother. Mine stopped working after 6months of occasional use!. I'm 70y/o, 110lbs & used it after exercising! Now I'm using my brother's until I find one that is "Dependable!!! Looks good-just stopped after 6 months! Poor Wiring???
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Frequent Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 5 months
customer_reviews.text: It worked great! I used it about 12 times went to turn it on and it won’t start! I had it for 5 months..
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Spend the $50 on a real massage.
customer_reviews.text: Product is awkward to use. Doesn’t sit on the neck properly. You can’t really massage anything else with it other than the neck..(when you can get it to actually touch the neck). It’s arm holes are too long so I have to force my arms out and stand to get it to even work. Overall waste of money. Save the $50 and get a massage.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: The heating is not working
customer_reviews.text: First of all, the heating is not working. And it's not that easy to use, as you have to keep it at the right position with right pressure. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Styx

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best thing money can buy, honestly. I have horrible migraines and tension headache and just about 10 minutes using this and it helps so much. I didn't know it heated up too when I bought it so that was certainly a nice surprise. Certainly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Bryant

customer_reviews.title: It was an amazing massage while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: It was an amazing massage while it lasted. I had to send it back after about 20 days or so. There was some melting going on with some of the plastic parts inside and it stopped working properly. ***UPDATE*** The company sent me a few free items after getting my review. I feel that they took the time and made an effort to make up for the inconvenience. I am happy with the new products!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for shoulder pain
customer_reviews.text: This massager is awesome. As a new mom, my shoulder is so tired from carrying my baby. Every time after I used it I feel so relaxed. highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Ray001

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive this massager. The box looks to be in new condition as does the product itself. I got it out, read the manual, and plugged it in. It lit up red but did nothing else. The motors won't move and the power button won't even turn it off, I have to unplug it for the red (which I'm assuming is the heat setting) to turn off. I notified seller and am really hoping they make it right. I will update my review once I hear back from them because good customer service can fix any issue a customer may have and that's worth reporting on!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Already stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a prime day deal and really liked it at first. I am able to get my neck, shoulders and even lower back really well. It gets the knots and gives great relief. However, I’ve knly had it a couple of months and it’s already broken. I can still use it, but after one or two minutes it shuts itself off. Which is so frustrating considering when I first bought it it would stay in around 15 minutes. I like it, but I likely won’t replace with the same massager/brand as I don’t want to waste my money twice.
customer_reviews.author: Carley R.

customer_reviews.title: Feels good but broke after a few uses
customer_reviews.text: We loved this and used it frequently for neck and shoulder pain. It helped immensely with my tension headaches. However, when I tried to use it tonight it stopped working after a couple of minutes and would not power back on. We haven’t even had it for 2 months and it we’ve only used it less than a dozen times. I’m disappointed that it didn’t last longer, especially since we really liked it at first.
customer_reviews.author: B. Thorsted

customer_reviews.title: Looks high quality- but heat takes a while to get going
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. Faux leather looks expensive and is durable. Easy to clean with a cloth. Not a professional massage experience but pretty dang close for an at home product that costs less than one half of a body massage at a spa. Boyfriend loves it. Got him a foot massager by same brand to go with for total experience. He uses it on his shoulders for tension, and I use it on my lower back while sitting on the sofa. The heat takes a while to warm up (about one cycle), but if you keep using it gets to a lovely temperature. If you’re doubting, just get it!
customer_reviews.author: Kailee Carter

customer_reviews.title: Useful but motor dies out
customer_reviews.text: I've used the product every couple of days for about 2 months now. It's comfy and reaches the neck and back areas well. One major problem I've encountered however is the motor will start to stall out after about 10 minutes of regular use and not an excess amount of pressure from me. Then I'll need to wait for about an hr before the motor cools down and it's ready for use again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this massager for anyone!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product with amazing customer service! I had an issue with the first one I bought and they fixed the situation entirely. So many cheap back massagers just hurt you or don't get in deep enough. I lift heavy weights and exercise a lot and this thing is amazing for recovery. If you're creative, you can get sooo much more than just your neck and back (I.e. calves, quads, lats, arms, etc). If you just want a gentle warm massage, this product is great. If you reallly want to beat yourself up with it and get to the deep tissue, this product is great. I recommend it for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Conan

customer_reviews.title: Really helped my neck and back!!!
customer_reviews.text: This massager is amazing! It’s worth every penny. I was in a car accident and my neck and back had so many knots after going to the chiropractor and masseuse weekly I bought this massager. Being able to work out my knots nightly has really helped my neck and back, so much that I only have to use this several times a month. This machine is easy to use and really can go to any pressure you like using the straps. It is very well made and I love the heat option.
customer_reviews.author: Ta22

customer_reviews.title: Pain
customer_reviews.text: Bottom line, I believed the reviews and received this for my birthday. I finally opened it April 24 to use it because I had a pain in my shoulder. The pain in my shoulder still there but now I have a soar spot the size of my fist on the right side of my back; my back feel injured. I knew I did not like how the massage felt but I thought it was me until now. I am laughing because I am in pain.
customer_reviews.author: Kktc

customer_reviews.title: Hurt my Wife
customer_reviews.text: Please note: My wife is SMALL. She's only 4' 11". She teaches special needs children and it's extremely physical. It causer her a lot of back and neck pain with lots of "knots" in her muscles. I got this to help since I have sever arthritis in my hands and it hurts to massage her neck more than a few minutes. She used this Christmas night and it felt really good, until about 10 minutes in when her arms, shoulders and neck started hurting. She's still in pain 2 days later and probably will have to return this for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Frye

customer_reviews.title: Can’t apply pressure
customer_reviews.text: If I lean into it with any pressure at all it stops moving. I have a massage pillow I ordered from Amazon years ago and I can lean into it and it’s still going strong years later.
customer_reviews.author: DF

customer_reviews.title: Feels like hands on your shoulders!!
customer_reviews.text: The bad news first.... I wish the cord was longer and didn't pull out so easily from the massager. The good news is that this thing feels awesome, like someone is actually working out the kinks with their hands. You slip your arms through the loops and can move it up and down from your neck to your lower back, pulling into your back for added pressure depending on how deep you want the massage. It's incredible! I carry so much stress and tension in my neck and shoulders and this thing breathes life back into my tense muscles. It does come with a car cord, which would work as a passenger, not the driver.
customer_reviews.author: Tlamb

customer_reviews.title: Really relieves tension and muscle pain
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I use this every day after work. We both have recurring neck tension and muscle pain. This helps relieve it daily. My husband calls it his "precious." I even used it on my lower back during my time of the month and it was amazing in removing all the dull pain.
customer_reviews.author: jyk

customer_reviews.title: The Worst - Turns Off Randomly
customer_reviews.text: The first one I tried would randomly turn off. The company was super great & sent another one quickly. The second one turned off randomly, too. These are terrible- you’re better off buying from InvoSpa (which I bought a year ago & worked great for a year). I’ll be buying from InvoSpa again. Avoid this massager!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Skyes

customer_reviews.title: Stops Working for No Reason
customer_reviews.text: Used this product 6-7 times over the last month, never more than 15 minutes at a time, but it will no longer turn on. Checked the plug, cord, connections, etc. but it's dead. Ignoring the fact that this massager is defective, it provided just mild pain relief. I can work the knots out of my neck and shoulders better with a simple roller-ball massager than with this product.
customer_reviews.author: KL

customer_reviews.title: Make sure the zipper is functional. It protects motor and heating element.
customer_reviews.text: I tried one that a friend had and ordered it on the spot. My wife planned on using this for back and neck pain. I can't accurately rate the item because when the product arrived, we noticed that the zipper that covers the massage motor and heating element was slightly open. Unfortunately, the zipper seemed to be missing the actual thing to zip up the zipper and as we handled the massager, the zipper kept opening up more and more. Since we aren't able to zip it back up, we are returning it. We have ordered a replacement and hope one that was delivered was just a one time defect.
customer_reviews.author: John L.

customer_reviews.title: Randomly shuts off after a couple minutes of use
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this a couple of times before it started glitching and now will only massage for a couple minutes before shutting off. It'll start back up once I push the button, it's just annoying that I have to keep doing so. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Caused back spasm
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my neck and used it several times and it worked and relaxed my neck and felt good. However I used it on my back last Monday and it caused back/hip spasm and the spasm is so severe I ended up at ER. Had to call ambulance and was bed ridden for 4 days. Still back and hip are hurting and not able to walk. I wish they put some warning on it!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ritika Kaur

customer_reviews.title: Not for me!
customer_reviews.text: Couldn’t use this massager. Even using the least pressure, this thing caused much pain to my already hurting back & neck. Will be returning this item.
customer_reviews.author: SueD

customer_reviews.title: I never leave reviews but wow...POOR QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these exact massagers but it was an older model, it lasted me 2 years and was amazing. I bought this one thinking the newer one would be 10x better. It stops working 5 minutes after you use it. I unplug it and plug it back in, goes for 2 minutes and stops again. I returned it and got a new one...does the same exact thing. This company is paying for reviews, this product is completely terrible don't fall for this scam. I feel like a Karen but I'm returning mine as we speak, it's just THAT bad lol
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Hess

customer_reviews.title: mixed results, vendor won't stop emailing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift and it was greatly appreciated for the back-massage on a sore back from too much driving! Two days later there were pains that were reminiscent of a pinched nerve. We had followed all directions and were careful not to overdue it. I had seen other reviews that report similar issues but I did not take them seriously. So if you try it out be careful. I am little sad that I had to return it as it is a well-crafted device. May 18, 2020: I am taking off another star because the vendor keeps emailing me to "make it right", first offering me an extra $30 refund and now following up excessively.
customer_reviews.author: O. K.

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality. Get something else.
customer_reviews.text: The massager only worked for a few days, then it would not start. I asked for a return and the provider offered only a 50% refund. Do not buy from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Very painful not for sensitive  people
customer_reviews.text: The balls hurt so bad , no way to make the pressure level less. Digs into your bones of your neck if you try to relax with it on, very painful. However it does get into my deeply tide in knots shoulder blade, just position it where straddles shoulder or arm, I have a high talorance for pain s, had my burley 6,'4 hubs try it on,nope , he said it pintched in wrong places and very uncomfortable as well .. I use it on my omg i am Dien days..
customer_reviews.author: Simi

customer_reviews.title: Broken after one month.
customer_reviews.text: I got mine less than a month ago. I used it about 6 times, and now it won’t work. Bummer, because I liked it.....when it worked. It says up in the description to contact the maker, but I can’t find contact info, and I don’t think I can return it to Amazon without the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: David W.

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: This came today and I immediately tried it out as I’ve had a tight neck for a few months now. I already am very impressed with this as there were many products to choose from and i really hoped I’d pick correctly. The massager consists of 4 sized heads on each side and they rotate both clockwise and counter clockwise. While using when the large head came around it gave excellent deep massage and when it reverses direction the counter direction gives a completely different deep penetration on my next. The combination of the two directions, auto switches every 30sec or so , I believe will loosen my next very well. Exactly what I was looking for .
customer_reviews.author: Jeff C.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: doesn't live up to the hype of the product, awkward and hard to use.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie G. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Husband loved it, until it broke
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Father's Day present for my husband. He used it 2 times and he loved it. On the third time, it broke. The massager is suppose to move in one direction and then it moves in the other direction. When we turn it on, it moves like it's suppose to, but it turns off when it has to move the opposite way. Now we have to keep turning it on, repeatably, every time we want to use it.
customer_reviews.author: PYYV27

customer_reviews.title: Great for neck tension & those who suffer from bulging disks in neck.
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t sure if I was going to like this or even use it. I have two bulging disks in my c6-c7 and get huge knots in neck area. The item is a big big and awkward but once you learn how to use it.,.it works great and will even leave you a little sore. You can use your own body weight to increase tension. 3 speeds and warmer. I have tried on other parts of my body and really didn’t like other than for neck tension. **If you found this review helpful, please take a moment and hit the button below and let Amazon know! Very much appreciated 😁
customer_reviews.author: Danielle B.

customer_reviews.title: Works!!!
customer_reviews.text: Yes!! I had shiatsu from years ago. Waist of money because it didn't get into the muscles.BUT THIS ONE..WOW!! It gets in and works out the kinks. Would 100% recommend. Between work and trying to get into shape . This is a life saver. I stopped working out my back and core because every time I would get a major headache/migraine. But now I stretch out and use this before I have a chance to tighten up. Sorry excedrin but, I got a better option now😀
customer_reviews.author: gina

customer_reviews.title: I say yes
customer_reviews.text: Does feel like hands in a weird way. The motion changes every once in a while so it's not the same the whole time. I had it massage my neck and sat in my office chair (reaches my neck) . Seems like you can use it by simply leaning against a wall. It definitely goes into my knots. I would recommend. I did just get it so idk just yet how it will work in the long run. It is easy yo use, has range of motion and so far i can say that it does help with pain relief
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Jean-Baptiste

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work!!
customer_reviews.text: This massager works for around 5 minutes and then it shuts off. You have to wait ~15 minutes before being able to turn it back on. When you turn it back on - same problem - 5 minutes and then it shuts off again. I contacted the company and they quickly sent me a new one but, it has exactly the same problem. I've had another one of these massagers - the FIVE S FS8801 Deep Tissue 3D Kneading Shiatsu Neck and it was way better. Will send this one back and go back to the other brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Miller

customer_reviews.title: NOT SO GOOD
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it seems okay, but the machine freezes as I push hard against my back.
customer_reviews.author: CHANG

customer_reviews.title: Feels good, motor is kind of weak, and the fabric rips
customer_reviews.text: This product feels fantastic on the shoulders. The knobs are somewhat too far apart to rub the back of my neck however. The fabric that you're supposed to wrap around the product to keep it clean pushes inwards toward the massager when you put it on your neck, so that the mesh of the massager is in direct contact with your skin anyway. The mesh is abrasive, so you'll need to have some clothing between you and the massager. The motors are strong enough when used on your shoulders, but stall when you massage your back by leaning back on the device with a chair behind it. Finally, the mesh ripped about 1.5 years in, rendering the product useless.
customer_reviews.author: Justin T.

customer_reviews.title: I had to fix an electrical cnnection so it would work.
customer_reviews.text: Bad: After I repaired the electrical connector to the switch conrol it worked pretty good. The wires coming out of the conduit where compacted before it entering the connector to the switch control board. This created too much pressure on the connector causing it to fail. Needs better connectors and I'm sure it would be G2G. The connectors are hot glued together to help support the low quality connectors. This should be addressed. Good; It worked really good once the connector problem is fixed. I've had serious neck problems over the years and it's starting to feel better already. The heat function is not strong but its there.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Broke after few use!
customer_reviews.text: Product broke after few use. It worked first few times but as soon as amazon 30 day return expired, product broke. I’m so disappointed at the quality of this product.
customer_reviews.author: ChiMommy

customer_reviews.title: What’s the warranty. Mines only lasted about 6 months.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this product. Was planning on buying one for my parents at Christmas time but I have had it for about 6 months and it isn’t working properly. Seems to be a short in it. Won’t work all the time and only works for like 5 minutes and the massage turns off. Does anyone know what the warranty is. I would hate to buy another one after only 6 months of use. I only use it about 2 times a month.
customer_reviews.author: ANNA HERNANDEZ

customer_reviews.title: so it's great for me
customer_reviews.text: Not for anyone who likes a soft gental message. This baby is a heavy duty deep message that really gets the knots out, of which I have many, so it's great for me! It has one speed which reverses, it has gental heat which could be a little warmer, and you can vary the intensity with hand straps. It works well.
customer_reviews.author: C. Tansy

customer_reviews.title: Feels amazing.
customer_reviews.text: wow, this thing is awesome digs deep down in and feels great. Nothing like getting a deep tissue massage while pooping. Love the arm straps helps it dig in deeper. I did try to pull it to the point of stopping the motors but couldn't very well built. Only complaint is that the only way to tell if the heat is on is feel it or look at the massage knuckles. Would be nice if it had an indicator light on the button.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Don’t believe the other reviews.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t believe all the hype in all the other reviews !!! This massager is just “ok”. Anyone who thinks this is as good as a real massage has obviously not been to a real massage therapist. It’s bulky and hard and really not that great. The controls are in an awkward position. The massage is very limited, it only moves in one type of movement and just begins to hurt the muscles after a while. Considering returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela & Kelly Collins

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: I'm strongly considering returning this for one reason only. The control panel is in a very inconvenient place. If it was down on the hand grip or even better on a small remote control this would be a keeper. Geez, I've got LED candles that have a remote with timer & dimmer, why can't they get this right? And not worthy to mention, the "dust cloth" included is useless...it moves all over the place
customer_reviews.author: David Mutina

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Hurts my neck during and after use. The balls are too big. You have to keep your hands in the pockets while using it.
customer_reviews.author: Alesia Shu

customer_reviews.title: Whoa! The reviews are true, this thing is strong...
customer_reviews.text: For years, I have been getting professional massages every week. My therapist is unavailable for a while so I figured, “why not?” This thing is cheaper than a single massage session. How bad could it be? My first reaction was WOW! It’s surprisingly strong. And you can position it exactly where you need it. If you’re used to getting quality massages...you will actually like this thing. It’s light years beyond any home device or chair that I’ve ever used. Very happy with this purchase so far. Don’t overdo it your first time, or you will end up sore. It really gets in there...
customer_reviews.author: jonloft

customer_reviews.title: Broke in 2 months, next one broke in 2.5 months
customer_reviews.text: Broke in 2 months. Nothing more to say. Well now there is more to say. Second model broke in 2.5 months. They are getting better but still wont last!!! Check that. Next one broke in less than a week. I receive monthly emails from seller offering $50 to take down review, but how can I? This simply does not work. Trying another brand, as I should have sooner.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: It works beter than a professiona lmassage
customer_reviews.text: This is truly a remarkable and an outstanding product. I just opened the box and used it moments ago and felt instant pain relief, blood circulation to neck area as well as release of tension and it is so easy to use. This is truly a blessing to have on the market especially in light of the current pandemic when you cant go to get a professional massage at the spa. This works better with no complaints, no exposure to others or to a potentially contaminated milieu. It just turns off and on when you want it to. I do not know who invented this thing man whoever it is they did a truly remarkable job I love this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awkward and sometimes awful!
customer_reviews.text: Using this is like getting a really awkward sometimes awful massage from someone but for some reason sometimes it makes you feel a little better. The heat isnt the great I constantly have to check if it's even on. And the arm length on this is really short. I purchased this for my father who is over 6 ft when it came I checked it out and it was awkward for me at 5'4. So I kept it for myself figuring awkward awful massages are better than no massages🤷‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Kerri

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Shoulder Massager one of the best!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product! The vendor did a good job with the manufacturing of this product. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: Does not work for more than a few minutes...
customer_reviews.text: After reading the great reviews and after trying various products to help with my fibromyalgia pain over the years, I had high hopes for this one. Unfortunately, the massage is not deep enough, and the motor stops after about 2-3 minutes of massage. It takes time to stop, turn off, back on, wait about 10 minutes... and then it starts again, only to shut off in a few minutes. Poor product, not deep pressure, and stops working after a few minutes of use. I will be returning for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Matt- Wilmington, NC

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying
customer_reviews.text: I just received it today, plugged it to charge for 3 straight hours to find out the battery didn’t take the charge, plugged it and turned it on it worked. Attempted to charge it again for 4 straight hours and the same problem exists, must be plugged in to work. Honestly it is a piece of crap, will definitely call amazon and return it if they can’t guarantee a working replacement
customer_reviews.author: Kal

customer_reviews.title: my wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: i bought this as a gift and i got brownie points from my wife. when my wife has a long day at work, she gets some relief with this messager. it gives good pressure wherever you use it. i used it on my shoulders, then throughout my back and down to my hamstrings and calves. it felt real good. if you pull on the handles, you get more pressure. we haven't tried it in the car yet. nonetheless, i highly recommend this awesome massager.
customer_reviews.author: Rudy

customer_reviews.title: Able to use this on legs, shoulder, back and stomach
customer_reviews.text: I’m surprise there is so many uses for this massager. I got this thinking it was just for the shoulder. Then I realized this can also be used on the legs, back and shoulder. Such a wide range of areas this can be applied to. I like that it has auto shut off after one cycle so I don’t have to keep track of it. The heating is not too hot and it feels good. I can take this on the go if I wanted to since it comes with a car plug.
customer_reviews.author: Mujun Xie

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because of the reviews. I had been through two cat scans, 2 different muscle relaxers and pain meds. They wanted to do another cat scan and I knew it was stress. I gave professionals the benefit of the doubt and lost. YOU WANT TO INVEST IN THIS BECAUSE IT IS BETTER THAN IT CLAIMS TO BE. BECAUSE THE REVIEWS ARE REAL. BECAUSE YOU WONT BE SORRY. AND BECAUSE IT IS ALL YOU NEED. BUY IT. You’ll feel compelled like I did, to write a great review.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Giordano

customer_reviews.title: Mine broke after a month of having it
customer_reviews.text: I work in a production facility and do a lot of overhead work and repetitive work. I ended up getting a pinched nerve in my neck. I bought this to help with recovery and it is great. It’s easy to use and works really well on my neck. I’ve also used it on my back and hip which worked pretty good too. ****UPDATE**** a little over a month of using this product it has quit working!!! I power it on and the heat comes on but the massage roller balls don’t move. Do not recommend this product if it’s going to not work and only having it a little over a month
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Massager and Amazing Customer Service - Updated Review
customer_reviews.text: I loved this massager...while it worked. I literally got it yesterday (07/18/2019) and it decided to stop working today (07/19/2019) in the middle of me using it. When I try to turn it on now, it'll light up and turn back off. I already emailed the company and have yet to hear back yet. Just makes me super sad because I loved this massager and now it no longer works after a day. UPDATE: Since I emailed the company, I received a working and functional product. Customer service is so easy to work with and are super nice. Thank you so much for helping me out and getting me a working product. This massager rocks!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Lange

customer_reviews.title: It’s worth it
customer_reviews.text: This is the best massager I have ever found for neck and shoulder concentration. I suffer fibromyalgia that mainly centers its pain there and in frequent migraines. This thing is a godsend. I use it far more than I would imagine the average person does, and it’s consistently helpful. The controls are simple — you control the pressure by hand placement. I use it while working at the computer, while watching tv, and sometimes even in bed. You can use it for other areas of the body - it seems good on lower back and legs, too — but it’s optimal on shoulders and neck.
customer_reviews.author: Ohio Kat NE

customer_reviews.title: Does not work-buyer beware!
customer_reviews.text: The first one I received worked for about a minute and then quit. I returned it for free and quickly received a replacement item. It worked a few times and has now completely quit. I can understand getting one defective until but not two in a row. Good luck if you buy this! It worked GREAT when it did work. Not worth the hassle!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Still looking for a good neck massager!
customer_reviews.text: I did not enjoy the internal rolling movements of this massage unit - very hard (maybe, they should use a softer material to make the rollers) and I did not enjoy the massage it was giving me. Returning this item. I did want to love it as I am having neck stiffness.
customer_reviews.author: Fun Books

customer_reviews.title: My new best friend
customer_reviews.text: Where has this been all my life? It's a serious massager. If you need a very light touch, this is not for you. If you like a medium to deep massage, this is life changing. $43 is what I paid for this and after using it and experimenting with all of its functions, I'd say that it's underpriced. The only thing is that I wish it was canvas or cloth rather than pleather, but not a deal breaker and not even an actual complaint.
customer_reviews.author: IrkusDirkusDeEscalante

customer_reviews.title: Product stopped functioning after 2 months. Poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality...I bought this about 2 months ago. At first I really enjoyed it, it was perfect for massaging the upper shoulders/lower neck. Sadly, as of last week, the unit no longer functions. It just stopped working out of the blue. I can only attribute it to poor product quality. If mine still worked I would highly recommend, unfortunately that is not the case. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bolek

customer_reviews.title: Helps with neck
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been using Shiatsu pillows for many years but it doesn’t really massage the neck. This massager was one of these impulsive choices “recommended by Amazon” and it turned out to be a good choice. It does massage a neck, relieves tension and helps to feel a little bit better at the end of the day. I’m considering buying a massage chair now :)
customer_reviews.author: Elman

customer_reviews.title: A must for everyone who has neck pain!
customer_reviews.text: I am having a hard time with my neck for 5 years. I even tried to buy some small massage devices, or go to massage sessions that could only last for some hours. I got this massage device and try for a week. I feel that my neck is relaxing, and the pain is reducing a lot. Moreover, it has handles which I can move to my back for some massages. I can take this massage to my work office as I am sitting in my office chair. It is also lightweight. Easy to carry anywhere, and easy to use. The price is affordable too. Paying for this device equals to one massage session. You can do the math!
customer_reviews.author: Linh

customer_reviews.title: I love its flexibility
customer_reviews.text: I have to say, I was a little apprehensive about purchasing this massager. I get massage every 3-4 weeks, and I'm a firm believer in it, but I work at a desk most days and travel in airplanes other days, so my neck and back are under constant assault. I pulled a muscle a week ago and even after a visit to my usual masseur it still hurt. I spent two mornings targeting the stiff area with the Naipo Massager, and it provided almost immediate results. I love its flexibility: you can position it around the neck, middle back, lower back, even legs. It does the job!
customer_reviews.author: Tim ring

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it...
customer_reviews.text: I have chronic shoulder and neck pain. It’s annoying and I don’t have a bottomless massage fund to go weekly. The issue was exacerbated by working from home at my dining table, which isn’t exactly ergonomic for a makeshift desk. My right side would go numb from using my mouse and working all day, until I bought this. It has helped tremendously! I just keep it by the side of the couch and take ten or so minutes at the end of the day to relax and help ease the tension. It can also be used on your lower and mid back, a hair stylist friend uses hers on her feet... Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kind of painful, hard to get in the right spot
customer_reviews.text: +1 star for excellent Customer service Cons: Painful to use, hard to get it in the right spot Pros: Has a heated option, kneads well when positioned I don't know if my arms are too long or what, but it hasn't been easy to get this in the right position that I'm looking for. The kneading parts are also pretty hard so if I pull a little much it goes from soothing to painful real quick. I do like that it has a heating option for days when that's needed after tough workouts. With the issues I've had though, I rarely use this thing because the hassle isn't worth it.
customer_reviews.author: The World's Worst Rapper // Magician // Tech Vlogger // Gamer

customer_reviews.title: SHORT LIFE.
customer_reviews.text: IT WORKED 3 TIMES AND THEN STOPPED WORKING. I RETURNED THE ITEM.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer44

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable product
customer_reviews.text: My mom always had neck pain due to an car accident. I brought this as a present for my mom for her birthday, she loved. She told me this was the best gift she received from me, with some skepticism I tried the thing, she was right. It was very comfortable, the pressure from the equipment was just right which gives very soothing feeling to my neck and my upper back. I absolutely love it, in fact I brought another one for my self.
customer_reviews.author: Sam C

customer_reviews.title: PURCHASE THE WARRANTY!
customer_reviews.text: This stopped working completely about a week and a half after the date I was allowed to return this product. When I would plug it in the light would go on for a second and then turn off. Good-bye $50!
customer_reviews.author: Derek Bontreger

customer_reviews.title: So good my neighbor tried to steal it away from me.
customer_reviews.text: This is really easy to use. Hook it up and turn it on. It was a setting for heat which is really effective. When I bought it I had chronic neck pain and after about 5 sessions I really didn't have the pain anymore. I would compare the rollers in the mesh of the contraption to a sports massage. It's not about comfort, it's about achieving ultimate relief. I definitely recommend this product for anyone with lower back or neck pain.
customer_reviews.author: Gneius29

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful item to have handy
customer_reviews.text: Oh the joy I had when it came in the mail and the relief I felt when I tried it out. I like that you can change the speed of the massage to enjoyable 3 different levels. The heat function stayed always in a comfortable warmth and not sweaty hot. The direction of the massage knobs can also be changed manually by pushing the little button by your arm sleeve. I even had it on the lowest setting massaging my stomach. It felt so good to me. I very much recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Martina

customer_reviews.title: AH-Mazing
customer_reviews.text: I love this. I love the adjustable pressure settings so I can get something similar to a deep tissue massage when I need it, or I can put it on low if I want something a little more relaxing. I love that it heats up. Only complaint is that it’s kind of awkward to hold. I wish the arm straps were just a little longer. Other than that, no complaints here. I bought it for myself but my have to order a second one because my husband loves it too and we often want to use it at the same time!! Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Dare

customer_reviews.title: Relieve muscle
customer_reviews.text: This is after I tried a massager from my friend ’s house, I know I must buy one, because it ’s so suitable for me who has been playing mobile phone for a long time, it really relieves my neck, and this massager can be used very conveniently. , The operation is very simple, you can adjust the intensity, there is a heating massage function, can be used for neck, back, shoulders, feet and legs, can also be easily used at home or even office, I think everyone should like to use, because It's really easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Strong massage but seems to be wearing down
customer_reviews.text: I feel as of its wearing down already unfortunately. I have only had a short time and not much use out of it. Wrap around cover is a good thought but more of an annoyance. Heat is minimal. It does provide relief just not confident in it lasting long.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: They've replaced the netting with a diff fabric from the picture. I was worried about the netting, I'm very happy with the change, a smooth stretchy fabric. This gives a great massage with heat. I've used it laying down on top of it so it's strong enough for that. The buttons are easy to reach but I don't use them.... the on-off button is all I use. It starts with heat and massage that changes directions after some time. I've not timed it but it massages for a long time...15-20 mins? I don't think you'll be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Claudette

product_meta.title: Naipo Shiatsu Back and Neck Massager with Heat Deep Kneading Massage for Neck, Back, Shoulder, Foot and Legs, Use at Home, Car, Office
feature_bullets: * Adjustable intensity button providing 3 different speeds, from low,medium and high depending on your preference.
* Features 8 deep-kneading Shiatsu massage nodes to sooth tired, relieve muscle tightness.
* Built in advanced heat function transfers warmth to muscles. Automatic shut down in 20 minutes.
* 3D-Rotation kneading massage rollers in ergonomic U-design, perfect for office, vehicle and home, UL approved power adapter and a car adapter are included.
* Please feel free to contact Naipo Customer Center directly with any return issue with our electric massager. You can return your undamaged product and packaging within 30 days for any reason.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
